short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plants Vs Zombies wallpaper turn new tab to custom Plants Vs Zombies background. Plants Vs Zombies wallpaper theme for game fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Rotate Plants vs Zombies wallpapers every time you open a new tab.
2. Switch between random Plants vs Zombies backgrounds or select your favorite in the wallpaper customization panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Quick links to your email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New Note feature to jot down your tasks.
7. Quick links to frequently visited websites.
8. Direct access to your bookmarked pages.
9. Shortcut panel for adding and accessing favorite websites rapidly.
10. Instant access to Google applications.
11. Easy navigation to additional themes.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. Quick download option for wallpapers.
14. Fast access to gaming portals.
15. Activate dynamic weather effects like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks in the Plants vs Zombies tab.
